# Summary


# Introduction

This study was carried in the context of a recruitment process at esqLABS. 
The goal is to make a design proposal that should make the use of the [{esqlabR}](https://github.com/esqLABS/esqlabsR) package easier and streamlined.
the esqlabR packages allow its user to model and simulate many drug effect and properties based on user's define scenarios.
These scenarios are parameterized through pre-formated excel files.
